title: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.
OB: The item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
EB: On the second attempt, the item can be selected.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view. Note that the item cannot be selected.
3. Retry selecting the item. Confirm that it can be selected this time.
